perturbation.original_text: 1. Except as otherwise provided in this Item, two (2) hours will be allowed for    loading and three (3) hours will be allowed for unloading. A charge of $12.50    per half hour or fractional part thereof shall apply for all time consumed in    excess of free time allowed for loading when due to delays caused by Shipper    or Consignor and beyond Carrier's control. A charge of $50.00 per hour or    fractional part thereof shall apply for all time consumed in excess of free    time allowed for unloading when due to delays caused by Shipper or Consignee    and beyond Carrier's control.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. Except as otherwise provided in this Item, one (1) hour will be allowed for    loading and four (4) hours will be allowed for unloading. A charge of $25.00    per half hour or fractional part thereof shall apply for all time consumed in    excess of free time allowed for loading when due to delays caused by Shipper    or Consignor and beyond Carrier's control. A charge of $25.00 per hour or    fractional part thereof shall apply for all time consumed in excess of free    time allowed for unloading when due to delays caused by Shipper or Consignee    and beyond Carrier's control.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction by altering the free time allowed for loading and unloading, as well as the charges for exceeding the free time.

perturbation.original_text: 2.  Shipments may not originate in Louisiana or Texas, and must be destined to     points in the United States in or east of Minnesota, Iowa, Kansas, Oklahoma     and Texas.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.  Shipments may originate in Louisiana or Texas, and must be destined to     points in the United States in or east of Minnesota, Iowa, Kansas, Oklahoma     and Texas.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction by permitting shipment origins to include Lousiana and Texas.
perturbation.location: ITEM 260: RETURN SHIPMENTS - TENDERED FOR VEHICLES ENROUTE

perturbation.original_text: Except as otherwise provided, Carrier shall be responsible for cleaning the  trailer and disposal of all commodity heels and wash water following each  shipment using Carrier's trailers, and no charges to Consignor or Consignee  shall apply because of such cleaning or disposal. Shipper shall be responsible  for cleaning any trailers owned or furnished by Shipper and used by Carrier.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as otherwise provided, Shipper shall be responsible for cleaning the  trailer and disposal of all commodity heels and wash water following each  shipment using Carrier's trailers, and charges to Consignor or Consignee  shall apply because of such cleaning or disposal. Carrier shall be responsible  for cleaning any trailers owned or furnished by Shipper and used by Carrier.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces contradiction as the responsibility for cleaning the trailer has been changed from Carrier to Shipper.
